articles.description: Will you get sick if you go out without a jacket? Does eating chicken soup really help? Experts share the generational advice worth following.
articles.content:
Some of the health advice your grandparents gave you is worth following, experts say.
Many families have at-home health remedies theyve sworn by for generations. In fact, for many people, these beli… [+4607 chars]
